Hi AdamWR.
Sorry about this, but I am desperate not to get this chance wasted.

Could you or someone else please look into this issue:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/182200

Since you have responded in a timely manner to my issues, I thought I'd alert you because I don't want the issue to be closed again with being fixed this time.

Thanks in advance, and I apologise for any inconvenience.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffacebook.com) ### Comment > Facebook Messenger is blocking the sending of photos and other attachments with Adguard enabled. It works fine if I disable protection. This has only been occurring within the last couple of months or so (as of September 2024). Username: `@I don't use github` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/d4pgefqo85wsokcscs0sso4gco40kgoldrurm7dolc.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/koie0punyaoko0kkokggkkw0wck40ssj0yxnupni8g.jpg?nc=1)
